entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Annapolis Royal
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:50 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain or snow. High 11.
entry.summary: Light snow or rain changing to rain in the morning. Fog patches developing in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 15 mm. Snowfall amount 5 cm inland. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming south 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Showers at times heavy. Low 8.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy. Risk of thundershowers overnight. Fog patches. Amount 15 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the evening. Low 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023
